scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w shared" "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run build -w shared && npm run typecheck -w backend && npm run typecheck -w frontend
